alert.note: Alert for Mobile Central (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 7:35PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Mobile County through 830 PM CDT... At 735 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Midtown Mobile, moving west at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Midtown Mobile, Tillmans Corner, I10 And I65 and Mobile Regional Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
